availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, resident. Lincoln County, Kentucky, native. Son of Samuel Owsley and Eliza W. Owsley. Married to Susan Malinda Miller Owsley in Madison County, Kentucky, on October 15, 1861. Father of Mary E. Owsley. Resident of Lincoln County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned twenty-nine enslaved persons in Lincoln County in 1850. Resident of Lincoln County in 1860. Household owned twenty-nine enslaved persons in Lincoln County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film 000183317.
"Mr. J.S. Owsley Passes Away," Lexington Leader (Lexington, KY), January 24, 1914), p. 1.
